assetshandler

Class AssetsLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • assetshandler.AssetsLoader

  • public class AssetsLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    A class with purely static methods for the purposes of loading saved assets (Species, FoodTypes and ToyTypes) from a file.
    Author:
    Alex Tompkins (ato47)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AssetsLoader()

      static FoodType[] loadCustomFoodTypesFile(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
      Loads all FoodType assets from a custom file containing only FoodType blocks.
      static Species[] loadCustomSpeciesFile(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
      Loads all Species assets from a custom file containing only Species blocks.

      Loads all ToyType assets from a custom file containing only ToyType blocks.

    • Method Detail

      • loadCustomAssetsFile

        public static java.lang.Object[][] loadCustomAssetsFile(java.io.File customAssetFolder)
                                                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                        java.io.IOException
        Loads a file wherein are defined a number of different types of different objects. Each type, for example FoodTypes, are enclosed by markers such as "@FoodTypes" on either side.
        Parameters:
        customAssetFolder - File object representing the folder in which the assets are contained. Contains a config.txt file and an images folder, containing subdirectories for each type to store their icons.
        Returns:
        Returns an Object array with 3 arrays within it: a Species array, a FoodType array and a ToyType array.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Will throw FileNotFoundException if the File given is invalid (e.g. its parent directory does not exist).
        java.io.IOException - Will throw IOException if an error occurs during reading of the File given.

      • loadCustomSpeciesFile

        public static Species[] loadCustomSpeciesFile(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Loads all Species assets from a custom file containing only Species blocks.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - The InputStream of the custom species file.
        Returns:
        Returns an array of species.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws IOException if an error occurs while reading the InputStream, or when closing it.

      • loadCustomToyTypesFile

        public static ToyType[] loadCustomToyTypesFile(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Loads all ToyType assets from a custom file containing only ToyType blocks.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - The InputStream of the custom species file.
        Returns:
        Returns an array of ToyTypes.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws IOException if an error occurs while reading the InputStream, or when closing it.

      • loadCustomFoodTypesFile

        public static FoodType[] loadCustomFoodTypesFile(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
                                          throws java.io.IOException
        Loads all FoodType assets from a custom file containing only FoodType blocks.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - The InputStream of the custom species file.
        Returns:
        Returns an array of FoodTypes.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws IOException if an error occurs while reading the InputStream, or when closing it.
